testsuite.name: MealPlannerTests
testsuite.system-out: ?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m Which meal do you want to add (breakfast, lunch, dinner)? > lunch Input the meal's name: > sushi Input the ingredients: > salmon, rice, avocado Category: lunchName: sushiIngredients: salmon rice avocado The meal has been added! ?[1;31m Start test 2?[0m Which meal do you want to add (breakfast, lunch, dinner)? > dinner Input the meal's name: > salad Input the ingredients: > lettuce,tomato,onion,cheese,olives Category: dinnerName: saladIngredients: lettuce tomato onion cheese olives The meal has been added! ?[1;31m Start test 3?[0m Which meal do you want to add (breakfast, lunch, dinner)? > breakfast Input the meal's name: > oatmeal Input the ingredients: > oats, milk, banana, peanut butter Category: breakfastName: oatmealIngredients: oats milk banana peanut butter The meal has been added!
